title: Ski Chalet Luxury in Verbier, Switzerland
description: Experience one of the world’s best ski resorts with a luxury chalet stay including a private chef in the winter playground of Verbier, Switzerland. Loved by celebrities and royalty including Prince Harry, Leonardo DiCaprio and the Beckhams, you can experience this high-end skier’s paradise with daily breakfast, gourmet three-course dinners with two paired wines, daily afternoon tea and more included at Ski Armadillo.

title: Switzerland Ski Retreat in the Heart of Verbier with Alpine Views
description:
Après-ski aficionados and alpine adventurers on the hunt for high-altitude hedonism need look no further than Experimental Chalet, a glamorous take on a traditional ski hotel in the heart of Switzerland’s Verbier. Standing proudly in the middle of the ski town, this 70s-inspired ski retreat is perfectly perched for days on the slopes and evenings on the schnapps. A complimentary hotel shuttle will take you and your gear to the main gondola every morning, but if you fancy stretching your legs, it’s only a 10-minute walk.

There's no doubting your location when you wake up each morning - every room and suite at Experimental Chalet has breathtaking views of the surrounding ranges, complementing the Fabrizio Casiraghi-designed interiors. After a day on the mountain, make a beeline for the ground-floor spa for a sports massage, facial or session in the hammam, or settle into a moss-green banquette in the restaurant to sample the locally inspired fare of French founder Greg Marchand. Retire to the first-floor bar to sip on curated cocktails by the open fire or take the party downstairs to the legendary Farm Club: skip the queues by using the VIP guests entrance, next to the reception desk.
offer_address: Route de Verbier Station 55, 1936 Verbier, Switzerland
